title: Fossil Fuels Fight To Keep America Warm This International Clean Energy Day
description: Winter Storm Fern continued to rage on Monday, coinciding with the United Nations' "International Day of Clean Energy" as fossil fuels supplied much of America's electricity.

title: Earth’s Ancient Atmosphere May Have Rained Down The Key Ingredients For Life - astrobiology.com
description: Earth’s Ancient Atmosphere May Have Rained Down The Key Ingredients For Life astrobiology.com

title: Earth’s Ancient Atmosphere May Have Rained Down The Key Ingredients For Life
description: New research published in Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences reveals that Earth’s ancient atmosphere may have acted as a global chemical factory, naturally producing sulfur-containing molecules that would later become essential building blocks of life. The study suggests that before life existed, Earth’s sky was already generating complex organic compounds, challenging the long-held [...]The post Earth’s Ancient Atmosphere May Have Rained Down The Key Ingredients For Life appeared first on Astrobiology.

title: The company making artisanal pasta from Wairarapa-grown, ancient grains
description: When a pest put paid to pea seed farming in South Wairarapa, a replacement crop was introduced that's producing delicious results.

title: What an ancient jellyfish can teach us about the evoution of sleep
